Class Game

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Canvas
          ca.proj.game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Runnable, Accessible
public class Game
extends Canvas
implements Runnable

Game.java is the game-state manager.
